alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 3:21AM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...In Washington, South Washington Cascades. In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels around 4000 feet early this morning lowering to around 2500 feet Monday afternoon. Locally higher snowfall amounts appear likely to fall in the area between Santiam and Willamette Passes where 5-10 inches of snow is possible. Expect snowfall intensity to decrease rapidly during the late evening hours on Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
